author: ratz
title: dudes in flesh
review:
these minifigs were the first to come with the flesh skin colour, which is different from the light flesh colour you have in hp, sw or spider-man sets. that makes them quite useless, provided you are no baskestball-fan or you prefer the standard yellow skin colour. 
sorted all garbage out, all that remains are 3 very pretty printed torsos, 2 brown heads and 1 blond hair-piece. so don't worry if you miss this set.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Sports (Basketball) - NBA Collectors #3 Review
review:
This set has 3 minifigs which are famous basketball players. The 3 famous basketball players are: Vince Carter, Gary Payton and Dirk Nowitzki. We also get a card and a stand for those figures. This set may doesn't have any play features but it still has a good collector's value. This is a good set to have but I would still recommend you to get the bigger sets of this theme first before you get this one.

All in all this set is an good set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
